diff_user.system:
You are an expert data engineer specializing in converting data to text. You will be given the current Python program with its BLUE score and an inspiration program and your task will be to evolve the current Python program to improve the score. It is a program that converts a list of triples into natural language text. The given triples will be associated with the topic: Artist. The program must implement a function called 'predict' that accepts a list of triples and generates a coherent, contextually relevant sentence that accurately represents the information contained in the triples. Ensure that the generated text is fluent, grammatically correct, and maintains the meaning of the original data. There can be multiple triples given that make up a complex sentence. Converting all those triples into one sentence will award greater score. An example of a complex sentence:
Triples:
(Antwerp | cityServed | Antwerp International Airport)
(Belgium | country | Antwerp)
(City of Brussels | capital | Belgium)
Example sentence:
"Antwerp International Airport serves the city of Antwerp which is in Belgium, where the capital is Brussels."

The 'predict' function returns that sentence as a string. Below is the list of all possible predicates that can be given as an input. With the given predicates and example triples implement the 'predict' function so it can process all the possible predicates:

Predicate: associatedBand/associatedMusicalArtist - Example triple: (Aaron Bertram | associatedBand/associatedMusicalArtist | Kids Imagine Nation)
Predicate: background - Example triple: (Aaron Bertram | background | "non vocal instrumentalist")
Predicate: birthDate - Example triple: (Aaron Bertram | birthDate | 1981-04-03)
Predicate: genre - Example triple: (Aaron Bertram | genre | Ska punk)
Predicate: instrument - Example triple: (Aaron Deer | instrument | Bass guitar)
Predicate: origin - Example triple: (Aaron Deer | origin | Indiana)
Predicate: activeYearsStartYear - Example triple: (Aaron Turner | activeYearsStartYear | 1995)
Predicate: birthPlace - Example triple: (Abradab | birthPlace | Katowice)
Predicate: birthYear - Example triple: (Ace Wilder | birthYear | 1982)
Predicate: occupation - Example triple: (Ace Wilder | occupation | Singing)
Predicate: recordLabel - Example triple: (Ace Wilder | recordLabel | Warner Music Group)
Predicate: deathPlace - Example triple: (Agustín Barboza | deathPlace | Asunción)
Predicate: alternativeName - Example triple: (Ahmet Ertegun | alternativeName | "A. Nugetre")
Predicate: activeYearsEndYear - Example triple: (Albennie Jones | activeYearsEndYear | 1950)
Predicate: deathDate - Example triple: (Alfred Garth Jones | deathDate | "c. 1944")
Predicate: nationality - Example triple: (Alfred Garth Jones | nationality | United Kingdom)
Predicate: professionalField - Example triple: (Alfred Garth Jones | professionalField | Illustration)
Predicate: musicFusionGenre - Example triple: (Alternative rock | musicFusionGenre | Nu metal)
Predicate: musicSubgenre - Example triple: (Alternative rock | musicSubgenre | Christian alternative rock)
Predicate: stylisticOrigin - Example triple: (Alternative rock | stylisticOrigin | New wave music)
Predicate: language - Example triple: (Canada | language | French language)
Predicate: officialLanguage - Example triple: (Canada | officialLanguage | French language)
Predicate: derivative - Example triple: (Hip hop music | derivative | Drum and bass)
Predicate: location - Example triple: (Kill Rock Stars | location | Portland, Oregon)
Predicate: governingBody - Example triple: (London | governingBody | Greater London Authority)
Predicate: leader - Example triple: (London | leader | Boris Johnson)
Predicate: leaderTitle - Example triple: (London | leaderTitle | European Parliament)
Predicate: country - Example triple: (Montevideo | country | Uruguay)
Predicate: ethnicGroup - Example triple: (Paraguay | ethnicGroup | Mestizo)
Predicate: parentCompany - Example triple: (Philips Records | parentCompany | Universal Music Group)
Predicate: bandMember - Example triple: (Suburban Legends | bandMember | Brian Robertson (trombonist))
Predicate: capital - Example triple: (United Kingdom | capital | London)
Predicate: anthem - Example triple: (Uruguay | anthem | National Anthem of Uruguay)
Predicate: currency - Example triple: (Uruguay | currency | Uruguayan peso)
Predicate: demonym - Example triple: (Uruguay | demonym | Uruguayans)
Predicate: isPartOf - Example triple: (Asunción | isPartOf | Gran Asunción)
Predicate: distributingCompany - Example triple: (RCA Records | distributingCompany | Legacy Recordings)
Predicate: training - Example triple: (Liselotte Grschebina | training | School of Applied Arts in Stuttgart)
Predicate: populationDensity - Example triple: (Israel | populationDensity | 387.63)
Predicate: meaning - Example triple: (Petah Tikva | meaning | "Opening of hope")
Predicate: longName - Example triple: (Israel | longName | "State of Israel")
Predicate: areaTotal - Example triple: (Karlsruhe | areaTotal | 173.46)
Predicate: foundingDate - Example triple: (German Empire | foundingDate | 1871-01-01)
Predicate: elevationAboveTheSeaLevel - Example triple: (Karlsruhe | elevationAboveTheSeaLevel | 115.0)
Predicate: postalCode - Example triple: (Karlsruhe | postalCode | 76131–76229)

artifacts_json:
{"LOW BLUE SCORE 0": "The program did very poorly with the given triples, getting BLEU score 0.0. The input triples were:
Rock music | musicFusionGenre | Bhangra (music)
Al Anderson (NRBQ band) | associatedBand/associatedMusicalArtist | The Wildweeds
Al Anderson (NRBQ band) | instrument | Singing
Al Anderson (NRBQ band) | genre | Rock music
Rock music | stylisticOrigin | Blues

The generated text was:
Rock music , who has a musicFusionGenre of Bhangra (music), has a stylisticOrigin of Blues, and Al Anderson (NRBQ band) is a Rock music musician who plays the Singing, who is associated with the band The Wildweeds.

The example correct sentences are:
A former The Wildweeds band member, Al Anderson is a singer in the band, NRBQ. This band's genre is rock music which has its stylistic origins in blues. The music Bhangra is part of the fusion genre, partly coming from Rock music.
Al Anderson is a singer in the rock band NRBQ and a former member of The Wildweeds. Rock music originated from blues and Bhangra is fusion partly from Rock.
Rock singer Al Anderson, of NRBQ, is a former member of The Wildweeds. Rock has its origins in Blues while influencing the fusion style of Bhangra.
", "LOW BLUE SCORE 1": "The program did very poorly with the given triples, getting BLEU score 0.0. The input triples were:
Asunción | isPartOf | Gran Asunción
Agustín Barboza | birthPlace | Asunción
Paraguay | leader | Juan Afara
Agustín Barboza | deathPlace | Paraguay
Paraguay | language | Spanish language

The generated text was:
Agustín Barboza , born in Asunción, who died in Paraguay, and Asunción , who has a isPartOf of Gran Asunción, and Paraguay , who has a leader named Juan Afara, has a language of Spanish language.

The example correct sentences are:
Agustín Barboza was born in Asunción (part of Gran Asunción) and died in Paraguay. The leader of Paraguay is Juan Afara, and the language is Spanish.
Agustín Barboza was born in Asuncion, Gran Asunción and died in Spanish speaking Paraguay, led by Juan Afara.
Agustín Barboza was born in Spanish speaking, Asunción, Gran Asunción, Paraguay, led by Juan Afara.
", "LOW BLUE SCORE 2": "The program did very poorly with the given triples, getting BLEU score 0.0. The input triples were:
Alternative rock | musicFusionGenre | Nu metal
Alternative rock | stylisticOrigin | Punk rock
Andrew White (musician) | background | "non vocal instrumentalist"
Andrew White (musician) | genre | Alternative rock
Alternative rock | stylisticOrigin | New wave music

The generated text was:
Alternative rock , who has a musicFusionGenre of Nu metal, has a stylisticOrigin of Punk rock, has a stylisticOrigin of New wave music, and Andrew White (musician) is a Alternative rock musician with a background as "non vocal instrumentalist".

The example correct sentences are:
Andrew White is a non-vocal instrumentalist who performs alternative rock music. Alternative rock originated from punk and new wave music and is an element of the fusion genre nu metal.
Andrew White plays an instrument in alternative rock which has its origins in new wave and punk rock music and of which nu metal is a fusion genre.
Andrew White is an alternative rock, non vocal instrumentalist. Alternative rock has its origins in new wave and Punk while being the origin of Nu metal.
